sen.j: 鳴滝塾（なるたきじゅく）は、文政7年（1824年）に、フィリップ・フランツ・フォン・シーボルトが長崎郊外に設けた私塾。
sen.e: Narutakijuku was a private juku (preparatory school) established in the suburbs of Nagasaki by Philip Franz von Siebold in 1824.

sen.e: Siebold commuted from Dejima to his juku, and he taught a wide range scientific fields of study such as western medicine and the natural sciences.
